home.title: I Create User Experiences

about.title: Hi, I'm Fredy Munevar.
about.description: I am a Designer and UX Developer with 17+ years of experience designing and developing intuitive digital interfaces. Starting in graphic design, I expanded into front-end development, working with tools like React, React Native, Next.js, typescript and SASS.Over a decade at Netbangers, I transitioned from Web Designer to Project Manager, leading the whole team from design to development. My diverse skill set enables me to deliver user-centered experiences across web and mobile platforms. I'm certified in Agile methodologies and passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly solutions while staying updated on the latest technologies.
about.closure: Through these experiences, I've developed a well-rounded skill set that spans UI/UX design, front-end development, and project management. My passion lies in creating user-centered digital solutions that not only look great but work effortlessly for end users.

branch.roleContent: UX Designer, UI Designer, Branding, Front-End Developer, Project Lead, and Co-founder
branch.typeContent: Mobile app, Desktop CRM, and Website
branch.title: Revolutionizing vehicle maintenance.
branch.intro: Branch App was created to revolutionize vehicle documentation and workshop management with a digital solution.Branch offers a mobile app for vehicle owners and a CRM for workshops, making it easy to organize documents, schedule maintenance, and manage repair processes.
branch.purposeContent: <part>Listening to common challenges among motorcycle users, we identified the need for a centralized digital platform to solve two primary issues:</part>
branch.purposeList:
• Managing vehicle documents was tedious and inefficient.
  • Communication between workshops and owners lacked structure, making it hard to manage and track maintenance processes.
branch.challengeContent: Our biggest hurdle was convincing potential users who relied on traditional methods to embrace a digital tool. Workshops were accustomed to spreadsheets or printed forms and were initially resistant to adopting a new technology-driven solution.
branch.researchContent: <part>Conducted extensive user research, which led to documents like the Problem Statement, User Persona, User Journey Map, and User Flow. These were foundational in aligning our team with the real issues users faced.</part><part>Created a brand identity for Branch, from logo design to defining a cohesive visual style that spoke to both individual vehicle owners and workshop managers.</part>
branch.designContent: Due to the absence of a reference app for this type of service, prototyping was crucial to showcase our solution's purpose and usability.Early mockups were made using Affinity Designer, then brought to life with Marvel for interactivity, allowing us to gather feedback through various iterations.Final UI Designs were developed in Adobe XD, incorporating insights from user testing to ensure an intuitive, accessible interface for both mobile and desktop users.
branch.devContent: I led the front-end development for both the mobile app and CRM, using React Native for the mobile app and Vue for the CRM.Employed SASS and TypeScript for clean, maintainable code, and used Git for version control.Managed development workflows with scrum boards in Jira and Clickup to keep tasks organized and our team focused on delivering an MVP.
branch.outcomeContent: <part>Branch App's MVP was successfully delivered, providing motorcycle owners and workshop managers with a centralized, easy-to-use tool for vehicle documentation and maintenance management.</part><part>Feedback from early users was overwhelmingly positive ‚Äî they noted that Branch simplified data access, reduced their dependency on paper documentation, and streamlined their communication and record-keeping processes.</part>

weelo.title: Simplifying property rentals through intuitive design
weelo.intro: Weelo is an innovative mobile application designed to streamline the property rental process for U.S. property owners, from legal background checks to contract signing and monthly payments.By unifying these processes into a single platform, Weelo simplifies the rental experience for property owners, saving them time and ensuring legal compliance.
weelo.purposeContent: Weelo was developed to address the specific needs of U.S. property owners who required an efficient, legally compliant method to rent out properties. It enables users to:
weelo.purposeList:
• Conduct comprehensive legal analyses on potential tenants.
  • Handle lease agreements digitally, with support for contract duration and terms.
  • Manage monthly rent payments through a unified platform.
weelo.targetContent: Property owners in the U.S. seeking a seamless, efficient way to verify potential tenants, manage legal contracts, and handle monthly rental payments.
weelo.designContent:
• As the UX Developer, I played a bridging role between design and development. My contributions focused on solving complex interaction challenges and refining information architecture to ensure smooth navigation.
  • I collaborated closely with the design team to guide critical decisions, ensuring that the user experience was optimized for ease and clarity.
weelo.devContent:
• During development, I was responsible for translating design into code, ensuring that the information architecture and user flows designed in the planning stages were executed seamlessly in the app.
  • My primary tools were React Native and TypeScript, which enabled cross-platform functionality and robust typing for scalable, maintainable code.
  • Within the company, we used a highly structured workflow, incorporating Git Flow for version control, Husky for pre-commit hooks, and Unit Testing to maintain clean, high-quality code. This allowed us to create a collaborative environment with efficient processes for daily tasks, organized under the scrum methodology.
weelo.challengeContent:
• Adopting New Tools and Best Practices: Learning tools like Git Flow and package managers like Yarn and Brew required me to adapt and expand my skill set. Although challenging, these tools significantly streamlined our workflow and ensured a more maintainable codebase.
  • Pixel-Perfect Design Execution: The company's high standards for design and code quality required a pixel-perfect approach. Meeting these expectations involved precise attention to detail and close collaboration with the design team to ensure that every visual element was accurately translated into the app.
weelo.outcomeContent: Weelo successfully launched to positive feedback from users, who praised the app's ease of use, fluidity, and warm design.The app introduced an innovative approach to property rental management in the U.S., a market where such tools are still emerging.It quickly became known for its intuitive interface and the streamlined experience it provided for property owners.
